mapper.insert: INSERT INTO debt_transactions (debt_account_id, transaction_date, principal_amount, interest_amount, remaining_balance, created_at) VALUES (#{debtAccountId}, #{transactionDate}, #{principalAmount}, #{interestAmount}, #{remainingBalance}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM debt_transactions WHERE debt_account_id = #{debtAccountId} ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
